summary: A mild-mannered psychopath plays mind-games with a woman he has tied to a chair in his basement.
cast: Darío Grandinetti|Goya Toledo|Fernando Guillén|Eric Bonicatto|Blanca Apilánez|Alex Brull|Mariona Perrier|Alexis Hill|Àngels Sirvent|Susana Querol|Mikele|Arturo Matamoros|Germán José|Robert Forcadell
title: Palabras encadenadas
